header_text: Attractive person on social media: Behaviors

elements.text:
While scrolling through a dating app, you see an attractive person you met at the grocery store last week. You decide to like their profile. 

Here are some behaviors that someone might do at that moment or in the future:

texts: I want to change some of my pictures, but keep them the same.
I want to deactivate my account, but decide to keep it up.
I delete all of the pictures that might be embarrassing.
I send them a message to start the conversation.
I tell my friend about how I liked their profile.
